aboutMeText: Software Development and Management Engineer with solid experience in databases and web development, currently expanding my expertise in data analysis. Proficient in SQL, C#, ASP.NET, and recently JavaScript. I am actively enhancing my skills with data analysis tools such as Power BI, Qlik Sense, and Excel. As a proactive and self-driven professional, I lead high-performance teams and develop projects focused on process optimization and continuous improvement.

experienceItems.title: 2017 - 2021 Agricultural Sector Manager
experienceItems.description: Managed task assignments and supervised irrigation system maintenance for 15 subordinates, achieving a ~20% increase in production while ensuring product quality and accurate inventory allocation.

experienceItems.title: 2022 Website Designer
experienceItems.description: Conceptual proposal and graphic design for a company website based on its requirements.

experienceItems.title: 2023 Web Developer
experienceItems.description: Development of a web module for the control and monitoring of residential developments, based on the company's proprietary software.

experienceItems.title: 2023 - 2024 IT Teacher
experienceItems.description: Developed and implemented study plans for TSU and Engineering students in databases, cloud computing, and software development, achieving a 96% teacher evaluation satisfaction rate.

experienceItems.title: Data Analyst / Software Developer
experienceItems.description: Currently looking for a job where I can learn as much as possible, contributing my best to the company.

studyWatchDescription: A series of mockups designed for a wearable app tailored for the Apple Watch. The mockups showcase a clean and intuitive interface optimized for the Apple Watch's small screen, ensuring a seamless user experience.
orbikDescription: A website design created for the National Institute of Educational Robotics (INIRE). The project aimed to propose conceptual and graphical design for the organization's website, serving as a foundation for future development.
hrrrSummaryDescription: A Power BI dashboard summarizing HR data, including employee stats, such as education level, department, location, and more. Provides actionable insights for HR decision-making.
salesSummaryDescription: A dynamic and interactive sales dashboard created using Qlik Cloud. Provides a comprehensive overview of sales performance, including revenue, profit margins, and trends.
gymWebsiteDescription: React based website. A static website for a gym, mainly for advertising purposes, with a sort of menu of services and a contact form.
agriculturalBlogDescription: Made with Laravel and Bootstrap. A simple blog to share opinions and information about agriculture and livestock.
